licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: Original punctuation marks are straight or slightly bent vertical bars with a (more or less explicit) serif on top and sometimes also a knob at the foot.

Other palaeographic observations. Anusvāra is to the right of the character to which it belongs, usually at headline height but occasionally lower. Consonants are frequently doubled after anusvāra. Dependent o is often written with two separate strokes, but the single-stroke form also occurs. Dependent au differs from cursive dependent o in being asymmetrical, with a much larger right hump. Rare initial Ai occurs in line 6; its body is unclear but seems to be the regular form of Ai for this period and area (in turn resembling initial E plus a curly arm on the left), but in addition to this body, the present character also has an upper stroke identical to that for cursive o. Rare initial R̥ occurs in line 7; its shape is like the consonant bha with two extra arms on top (resembling an ā marker and its mirror image).

projectDesc.p: This project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xml file.

div.head: Plates

lg.l:
nnābhī-paṁkaruhād babhūva jagatas sraṣṭā svayaṁbhūs ta
taḥ
jajñe mānasa-sūnur atrir iti yas tasmān muner atritas

div.p:
tasmād āyur. ā
yuṣo nahuṣaḥ. nahuṣād yayātiś cakravarttī vaṁśakarttā. tataḫ purur iti cakravarttī. tato janamejayāo ’śvamedha-tritaya
sya karttaā/ tataḫ prācīśaḫ. prācīśāt syainyayātis. sainyayāter hayapatir. hayapates sārvvabhaumas. sārvvabhau
māj jayasenaḥ. jayasenān mahābhaumaḥ. mahābhaumād aiśānakaḥ. Aiśānakāt krodhānanaḥ. krodhānanād devakiḥ.
devake rir̥cbhukaḥ. rir̥cbhukād r̥kṣakaḥ. R̥kṣakān matinvaras satra-yāga-yājī sarasvatī-nadī-nāthaḥ. tataḥ kātyā
yanaḥ. kātyāyanān nīlaḥ. nīlād yduṣyantaḥs tat-sūutaḥ/

lg.l:
gaṁgā-yamunā-tīre yad aviccchinnaṁ nnikhāya yuū
paān kramaśaḥ
krir̥tvā tathāśvamedhān nāma mahākarmma-bharata yiIti yo ’labhataḥ/

div.p:
tato bharatād bhūmanyur. bhūmanyos suhotras. suhotrā
d dhastī. hastino virocanaḥ. virocanād ajamīlaḥ. Ajamīlāt saṁvaraṇaḥ. saṁvaraṇasya tapana-sutāyās tapatyāś ca sudhanvā. sudhanva
naḫ parikṣit. parikṣito bhīmasenaḥ. bhīmasenāt pradīpanaḫ. pradīpanāc cchantanuś.śantanor vvicitravīryyaḥ. vicitravīryyaāt pāṇḍurājaḥ/

lg.l:
yenā
dāhi vijitya kkhāṇḍavam atho gāṇḍīvinā vajriṇaṁ
yuddhe pāśupatāstram andhaka-riṣpoś cālābhi daityān bahūn

indrārddhaāsanam adhyarohi ja
yinā yat kālikeyādikān
hatvā svairam akāri vaṁśa-vipina-cchedaḥ kurūṇāṁ vibhoḥ/

div.p:
@@@tato ’rjunād abhimanyur. abhimanyoḫ parikṣiT/ parikṣito jana
mejayaḥ. janamejayāt kṣemuk{{ā}}aḥ. kṣemukān naravāhanaḥ. naravāhanāc c!chatānīkaḥ. śatānīkād udayanaḥ. tataḫ paraṁ tat-prabhr̥
tis!ṣv avicc!chinna-santāneṣv ayodhyā-siṁhāsanāsīneṣv ekānna-ṣaṣṭi-cakravarttiṣu gateṣu ta{ṁ}dvaṁśyo vijayāditya nāma rājaā vijigīṣa
yā dakṣiṇāpathaṁ gatvā ttrilocana-pallavam adhikṣipya daiva-durīhayā lokāntaram agamaT/ tasmin saṁkule
purohitena sārddham antarvvatnī tasya mahādevī muḍivaimu nāmāgrāhāram upagamya tad-vāstavyena viṣṇubhaṭṭa
-somayājinā duhitr̥-nirvviśeṣam abhirakṣitā satī * viṣṇuvarddhanam asūta. sā tasya ca kumārakasya mā
navya-sagotra-hārit!!a-putrādi-sva-kṣatra-gotra-kramocitāni karmmaāṇi kārayitvā tam avarddhayaT/ sa ca mā
trā vidita-vri!r̥ttāṁtas san nirggatya calukya-girau nandāṁ bhagavatīṁ gaurīm ārādhya kumāra-nārāyaṇa-mātr̥-gaṇāṁś ca saṁtappya śvetā
tapatraika-g!śaṁkha-paṁca-mahāśabda-pāliketana-pratiḍ!ḍhakkā-varāha-lāṁcchana-piṁcc!cha-kaṁta-siṁhāsana-makara-toraṇa-kanakadaṇḍa-gaṁggā
-yamunādīni sva-kula-kramāgatāni nikṣiptānīva sāṁbr!mraājya-cihnāni samādāya kaḍaṁba-gaṁggādi-bhūmipān nirjitya setu-na
rmmadā-madhyaṁ sārddha-sapta-lakṣaṁ dakṣiṇāpadh!thaṁ pālayām āsa/ śle!okaḥ/ tasyāsīd vijayādityo viṣṇuvarddhana-bhūpateḥ pallavānvaya-jaā
tāyaā mahādevyāś ca nandanaḥ tat-sutaḥ b!polakeśi-vallabhaḥ. tat-putraḥ kīrttivarmmaā. tasya tanayaḥ/ svasti. śrīmatāṁ sakala-bhu
vana-saṁstu!ūyamāna-mānavya-sagotrāṇāṁ hāritī-putrāṇāṁ kauśikī-vara-prasāda-labdha-rājyānāṁ mātr̥-gaṇa-paripālitānāṁ
svāmi-mahāsena-pādānudhyātānāṁ bhagavan-nārāyaṇa-prasāda-samāsādita-vara-varāha-lāṁcc!chanekṣaṇa-kṣaṇa-vaśīkr̥tārā
ti-maṇḍalānām aśvamedhāvabhr̥tha-snāna-pavitrīkr̥ta-vapuṣāṁ cālukyānāṁ kulam alaṁkariṣṇos satyāśraya-vallabhendrasya
bhrātā kubja-viṣṇuvarddhano ’ṣṭādaśa varṣāṇi veṁgī-deśam apālayaT/ tad-ātmajo jayasiṁha-vallabhas trayastriṁ
śataṁ/ tad-anujendrarājas sapta dināni/ tat-suto viṣṇuvarddhano nava/ tat-sūnur mmaṁgi-yuvarājaḥ paṁcaviṁśa
tiṁ/ tat-putro jayasiṁhas trayodaśa/ tad-avarajaḥ kokkiliṣ ṣaṇ māsāN/ tasya jyeṣṭho bhrātā viṣṇuvarddhana
s tam uccāṭya sapta-triṁśataṁ/ tat-putro vijayāditya-bhaṭṭārako ’ṣṭādaśa/ tat-tanujo viṣṇuvarddhanaṣ ṣaṭtriṁśa
taṁ/ tat-sūnur vvijayāditya-narendra-mr̥garājaś cāṣṭacatvāriṁśataṁ/ tat-s!ūtaḥ kali-viṣṇuvarddhano ’dhyarddha-varṣaṁ/ tat-suto guṇaga-vija
yādityaś catuścatvāriṁśataṁ/ tad-bhrātur vvikramāditya-bhūpates tanayaś cālukya-bhīmas triṁśataṁ/ tat-sutaḥ kollabigaṇḍa-vijayādi
tyaṣ ṣaṇ māsāN/ tat-sūnur ammarājas sapta varṣāṇi/ tat-sutaṁ vijayādityaṁ bālam uccāṭya tāḍapo maāsam ekaṁ/ taṁ jitvā cālu
kya-bhīma-tanayo vikramaāditya Ekādaśa māsāN/ tat-tāḍapa-rāja-suto yuddhamallas sapta varṣāṇi/ taṁ yuddhamallaṁ parihr̥
tya deśāt piṣṭvetareṣām api śātravān!ṇāM kṣmām ammarājaānuja-rāja-bhīmo bhīmas samā dvādaśa rakṣati sma/ tat-su!ūnur ānatārā
tir ammarājo nr̥pāgraṇīḫ paṁcaviṁśati varṣāṇi/ veṁgī-bhuvam apālayaT/ dvaimaāturo ’mma-nr̥pater ddaānnaṁ!na-nr̥po rāja-bhīma-nr̥
pa-tanayaḥ vidyā-kalāpa-caturaś caturaṁta-dharām apāt samās tya!israḥ Anu dānārṇn!ṇav-ad āsīd daiva-duśceṣṭayā tatas sapta
viṁśati varṣāṇi veṁgī-mahir aṇ!nāyi!akā/ Atrāntā!are dāna-narendra-sūnuḥ śrī-śaktivarmmaā sura-rāṭ-sadharmmaā yaś śauryya-śaktyā vi
nihatya śatrūN nsa dvādaśābdā{N}n samarakṣad urvvīM tasyaiva dāna-nr̥pates sādhvyāś cāryyaā-mahādevyāḥ sū
nur vvimalādityas satyāśraya-vaṁśa-varddhano devaḥ/ Analānala-randhra-gate śaka-varṣe vr̥ṣabha-māsi
sita-pakṣe yaṣ ṣaṣṭhyāṁ guru-puṣye siṁhe lagne prasiddham abhiṣiktaḥ/ śaśi-viśada-yaśo-vyāptyā sva
śarīra-vibodhanārttham avahat kaṇṭhe śaśalakṣma-lakṣma-lakṣmīṁ śaṁbhur bbirudaṁka-bhīma-nr̥pater yyasya/
Ari-karaṭi-kuṁbha-vidalana-mukta-samāmukta-rucira-muktā-nikaraḥ hāra ?yiva yasya dor-asir ā!adhyāsita-jaya-śriyo
bhāti ciraM/ yat-tejaḫ-prapalāyita-ripu-pura-gr̥ha-śālabhaṁjikā-mukha-rodhī lūtā-paṭas tu para-jana-vilokanā
sahana-baddha-paṭa ?yiva bhāti/ dussādhanādhika-virodhi-gajendra-saṁgha -nirbhedatas tribhuvanāṁkuśa-nāma yuddhe Anvarttha
taān nijam ajīgamad uddhataṁ yo baṁhiṣṭha-siṁha-parihāsi-parākrama-śrīḥ/ yas sārvvabhauma-dharaṇīśvara-nīta-kalpa
-prāghūrṇṇakebha-mada-sikta-mahī-vibhāgaḥ yas tarjjitānila-javāśva-sahasra-saṁgha -dhāṭy-āhr̥tāhita-śiro-’ṅkita
-śūla-koṭiḥ/ Ādau śaṁbhu-śiromaṇis sa ca sudhā-sūtis sudhāṁśus tatas tad-vaṁśyo bharatas tataś ca vijayāditya
ś calukyāṁkitaḥ śrī-satyāśraya-vallabhas tad api ca śrī-sarvva-lokāśrayo devo mummaḍi-bhīma-nāma nr̥patir yyo vaṁ
śa-karttaābhavaT/ saurāṣṭrān dārayantī niśita-paraśu-dhārāyamānā śakānāṁ lāṭānāṁ gurjjarāṇām atha bhavati mano
-hāriṇī vallabhā vā/ śūrān sva[Venkayya: +ḥ]sthān vidhatte sukr̥tivad akhilān svaira-m anyān vibhītāN kāṣṭhān taCHECKn tat-ta
paḥ śrīr irṣā!va nayati raṇe śauryya-sampad yadīyā/ sa vīra-makara-dhvajaḥ makara-dhvaja ?yiva dhvasta-vigra
haḥ grahapatir ivāhitāndha-tamasāpaharaḥ hara Iva rāja-kalā-dharaḥ dharaṇīdhara ?yiva
ramā-rāmābhirāmaḥ rāma ?yiva paraśu-kriyā-sahaḥ sahadeva ?yiva devaādhvaryyu-nandanaḥ
nandana-viśeṣa ?yivābhilaṣita-phala-samut-kavisahasraḥ sahasrākṣopamānaḥ mānavya-sagotraḥ gotra-ni
stārakaḥ tārakādhipānvaya-varddhī vr̥ddhi-niśākaraḥ karadī-kr̥tārāti-paramparaḥ para-narapati-nikara-mukuṭa
-taṭa-ghaṭita-maṇi-gaṇa-kiraṇa-parikarita-samaruṇita-caraṇendīvaraḥ vara-varāha-lāṁcchanālokana-maā
trā!a-vitrāsitākhila-dharādhīśa-cakraḥ cakravartti-padavī-samucitāneka-dhavala-cc!chatracc!chāyā-cc!chādita-sarvva
-lokaḥs sarvva-lokāśraya-śrī-viṣṇuvarddhana-mahārājādhirāja-parameśvara-paramabhaṭṭāraka-parama-brahmaṇya-parama
-māheśvaraḥ/ ?guddhavādi?-viṣaya-nivāsino rāṣṭraku!ūṭa-pramukhāN kuṭuṁbinas sarvvān samāhūya mantri-purohi
ta-senāpati-yuvarāja-dauvārikādhyakṣam ittham ājñāpayati yathā/ ādyo yaḥ svayam udbabhūva parama-bra
hmā nisr̥jyānv apo vīryyan tāsv avasr̥ṣṭam aṇḍam abhavad dhaimam n!mahat tena yaT/ tasmāl loka-pitāmaho vidhir abhūt ta
smān marīt!cy-ādayaḥ putrā ye daśa jajñire śrutimayaā varccasvino maānasāḥ/ teṣāṁ śreṣṭhatā!a
mo vasiṣṭha Iti yas sārundhatīko munis tasmāt k!uṇḍina Ity abhūd adh!tha ca tat -kauṇḍinya-gotre kra
maāT yo vidvān uditodita-dvija-varo droṇaḥ pramāṇībhar!vad vr̥tta+ḥ stutya-yaGAP OMITTED-matir nnityodaya
s satyavāK/ dattābhidhāna-sacivo haradatta-vara-prasāda ?yiva tasya sutaḥ śubha-kr̥t prabhā
va-mahitaḥ prabhu-mantrotsāha-śaktiyaOR EMEND TRAYA?saṁyuktaḥ/ tasya ca sad-guṇa-dhāmnaḥ pati-vratāyāś ca cīḍamaāṁbāyaāḥ va
jrābhidhāna Iti yas sūnus sūnr̥ta-vacās sumedhās sumaṇ!naaāḥ/ nityākarnn!ṇṇanayā saśvad vaṭubhiḫ paṭubhir ggr̥he veda
-śāstrāṇi yad-dhāmni padh!ṭhanti śuka-śārikāḥ/ bhīmeśvara-samo devo veṁgīśvara-samo nr̥paḥ vajrāmātya-samo ’mā
tyo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati/ nāgendre!air ddig-ibhaiś ca ṣoḍaśa-nr̥pair ādye!air ddhi!r̥tāṁ kṣmā-dhurāṁ vīrair apy atiśūdraka-prabhr̥ti
bhiś cājer ddhuraṁ dussahāṁ bibhrad yaḫ prathitaṁ kramān naya-balād bāhābalāt?? prāptavān saāhāyyaṁ bik!rudaṁka
-bhīma-nr̥patiḥ kāryyeṇa khaḍgena ca/ gotraṁ-cc!chettur ari-kṣamādhara-kulodbhedān mahendrāt kṣamaḥ śrīmān bhūpa-mahendra
Eva nitarāṁ gotraika-nistārakaḥ tad-vajrād atiribh!cyate laghutarād vajrābhidho ’yaṁ gurur yyan-nātho ’pi ca yad-bha
ṭaś ca vibudha-vrātair iti stūyate/ yattredhānala-dhūmra-dhūma-ghaṭitair abhrair nnijehāhita -kṣoṇībhr̥t-pura-dāha-dhūma-jani
tāṁbhobhr̥t-sahasrais samaṁ/ vyāptaṁ vyoma tadīya-śatru-lalanā-dr̥k-pāthasām ā??kṣamā siktā yat-paripā
vanātithi-pada-prakṣālanācc!chāṁbhasā/ yaḥ śrī-vajrāmātyo dhana-santarppita-jagaj-jana-stutyaḥ bhūsura-vaṁg!śā
dityaś śucir aticaturo vaco-niratyaya-satyaḥ/ budha-vajra-prākārā!o gr̥ha-niyamitāri-sainika-cakraḥ
cakra-bhr̥d ??ddhva??-śrīkaḥ śrīkaṇṭha-padāravinda-ṣaṭbh!caraṇaḥ/ sadā svavāco manasā ca karmmaṇā !!!nvakāri ye
nādhiguṇena kuṇḍinaḥ pravr̥tta-vaitānikavadharmmasaṁggatir dvijaādhinādh!tho ’yaya!mudāratā-nidhiḥ/ cālukya-cūḍāmaṇi-pā
da-bhakto bhaktaika-cūḍāmaṇir īśa-mūrttiḥ kīrty-anvito ’mātya-śikhāmaṇiḥ śrī -saujanya-ratk!nākara-nāmadheyaḥ/ saptāṁgake nṛ
pa-pade prabhutā pradhānā tādṛśy amātya-padavī khalu tad-dvitīyaā/ śrīdvāra-piṁcc!cha-karakātapa-vāraṇādis tasyāṁ vi
śeṣa-mahimā mad alābhi yena/ tasmai tad-bhaktāya kr̥ta-kleśāya kāramaceḍu-vāstavyāya kauṇḍinya-gotrā
yaāmātya-śikhāmaṇaye budha-vajra-prākārāya saujanya-ratnākarāya vajjiyapeggaḍa Iti prasiddhābhidhā
nāya bhavad-viṣaya!e/ pāṟuvaḻa nāma grāmeṇa sārddhaṁ raṇastipūṇḍi nāma grāmo ’grahārīkri!r̥tya mat-saṁvarddhi
tatvā!a-nimitte mayaā datta Iti viditam astu vaḥ/ Asyāvadhayaḥ. pūrvvataḥ kauta nāḍipiya ceṟuvu paḻumaṭi ka
ṭṭa/ Āgneyataḥ mroṁtukaṟtiyuṁ bālūriyu raṇastipūṇḍiyu muyyalikuṭṟuna velaṁga-guṇṭha paḻumaṭi kaṭṭa/ dakṣi
ṇataḥ peṁjeṟuvu kaṭṭa ḍiggunāli trova/ nairi!r̥tyataḥ pālūriyuṁ goṟu-keṭiyu raṇastipūṇḍiyu
muyyalikuṭṟuna cinta-guṇṭha/ paścimataḥ koṟukeṭi podaṟu/ vaāyavyataḥ ṟullasīmaiva sīmā/
Uttarataḥ kaḻapaṟtiyuneḻṭayu sīmaiva sīmā/ Ī!Aiśānataḥ Eḻṭayu mrontukaṟtiyu raṇastipūṇḍi
yu muyyalakuṭṟu/ Etad-raṇarastipūṇḍi-nāmaāgrāhāra-saṁbandhinaḥ tāṁkaḻapolamu-nāma-??llaṁghana-kṣe
trasyāvadhayaḥ. pūrvvato dakṣiṇataś ca gāṁgaleṟu/ paścimataḥ siripodipūṇḍiyu goṁganavroliyu ṟullayuṁ bottuna kollikuṟṟu/
Uttarataḥ siripodipūṇḍi-sīmaiva sīmā/ Asyopari na kenacid bādhā karttavyā. yaḥ karoti sa paṁcca-mahāpātā!ako bhava
ti/ tathā coktaṁ bhagavatā vyāsa-bhaṭṭāraken!ṇCORRECT?āpi/ bahubhir vvasudhā dattā bahubhiś cānupālitā yasya yasya yadā
bhūmis tasya tasya tadā phalaṁ/ svadattāṁ para-dattāṁ vaā yo haretu!a vasundharāṁ ṣaṣṭiṁ varṣā!a-sahasraāṇi viṣṭhāyāṁ jaāyate kri!r̥
miḥ/ Aṣṭama-varṣa-varddhane siṁha-maāse dattasyāsya śāsanasya śrī-daṇḍanāyaka Iti dvijaādhināyakaḥ/ Ājñaptir nr̥pakā
mo rāciyapedderi-tanaya-bhīmana-bhaṭṭaḥ. karttaiṣāṁ kāvyānām adh!tha śāsana-lekhakaś ca jontācāryyaḥ

Edited from the original plates by V. Venkayya(), with estampages and translation (skipping the legendary and historic genealogy up to line 36). The present edition by Dániel Balogh is based on a collation of Venkayya's edition with his rubbings. No image of the seal is available.
